majorArcana.name: The Fool
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: New beginnings, unlimited potential, free spirit taking a leap of faith.
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Reckless decisions without planning. Being taken advantage of through naivety.
majorArcana.shadowWork: Where does fear of judgment prevent authentic self-expression?
majorArcana.soulLesson: Trust the journey. Every master was once a beginner.
majorArcana.careerInterpretation: New career opportunity or entrepreneurial venture. Trust instincts.
majorArcana.romanceInterpretation: New relationship or fresh start. Approach with open heart.
majorArcana.wellnessInterpretation: Try new health approaches. Trust body wisdom.
majorArcana.familyInterpretation: Break unhealthy patterns. Beginner's mind helps.
majorArcana.selfGrowthInterpretation: At a threshold. Release old self for new to emerge.
majorArcana.schoolInterpretation: New subject or unique perspective valuable.

psychology.coreMetaphor: Starting therapy: vulnerable but necessary courage to not know.
psychology.growthPrompt: What would you attempt if you couldn't fail?

majorArcana.name: The Magician
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: You have all tools needed. Channel divine will into material reality.
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Talents misused or wasted. Manipulation or scattered energy.
majorArcana.shadowWork: Where do you give away power or manipulate rather than inspire?
majorArcana.soulLesson: You are conduit for Source. Your will aligned with Divine creates miracles.
majorArcana.careerInterpretation: You have skills and resources. Execute now. Time for action.
majorArcana.romanceInterpretation: Take initiative. Clear communication manifests desired relationship.
majorArcana.wellnessInterpretation: Mind affects body powerfully. Visualization and intentional healing work.
majorArcana.familyInterpretation: Use communication skills to mediate and bridge gaps.
majorArcana.selfGrowthInterpretation: Recognize your power. You create reality, not victim of it.
majorArcana.schoolInterpretation: You have capacity. Apply focused study techniques.

psychology.coreMetaphor: Mastering DBT skills: have tools, now practice applying them.
psychology.growthPrompt: What resources do you already possess but overlook?

majorArcana.name: The High Priestess
majorArcana.uprightMeaning: Trust inner knowing. Answers within, not external. Guards veil between worlds.
majorArcana.reversedMeaning: Ignoring intuition. Secrets kept. Disconnection from inner wisdom.
majorArcana.shadowWork: What truths are you avoiding? What does intuition whisper that ego refuses?
majorArcana.soulLesson: Universe speaks through symbols, dreams, synchronicities. Stillness reveals truth.
majorArcana.careerInterpretation: Trust gut about workplace. Information coming. Wait before acting.
majorArcana.romanceInterpretation: Pay attention to unspoken. Your intuition is correct. Honor mysteries.
majorArcana.wellnessInterpretation: Listen to subtle body signals. Explore mind-body connection, meditation.
majorArcana.familyInterpretation: Family secrets or unspoken dynamics. Intuition navigates what words cannot.
majorArcana.selfGrowthInterpretation: Develop intuitive abilities. Journal, meditate, note synchronicities.
majorArcana.schoolInterpretation: Trust understanding even if can't articulate. Incubation before breakthrough.

psychology.coreMetaphor: Pause before responding in therapy: stillness reveals deeper truths.
psychology.growthPrompt: What has your intuition been trying to tell you?

wands.name: Ace of Wands
wands.uprightMeaning: Pure creative potential. Divine inspiration. New passionate beginning.
wands.reversedMeaning: Creative blocks. False starts. Hesitation preventing action.
wands.shadowWork: What creative impulses do you dismiss? Where does fear kill inspiration?
wands.soulLesson: Source speaks through inspiration. Act on divine downloads.
wands.careerInterpretation: New project, job offer, or business idea with potential. Strike while hot.
wands.romanceInterpretation: New passionate attraction or renewed spark. Follow excitement.
wands.wellnessInterpretation: New fitness routine calls. Your enthusiasm fuels success.
wands.familyInterpretation: New creative project with family or renewed energy.
wands.selfGrowthInterpretation: New path ignites passion. Follow this thread.
wands.schoolInterpretation: Exciting new subject. Your enthusiasm makes you quick study.

psychology.coreMetaphor: First therapy session: full of potential if you commit.
psychology.growthPrompt: What idea keeps exciting you? What's one action to explore it?

cups.name: Ace of Cups
cups.uprightMeaning: Pure emotional potential. Divine love pours forth. Heart opens.
cups.reversedMeaning: Heart blocked. Emotions repressed. Love's flow dammed.
cups.shadowWork: What prevents your heart from opening? Where have you closed to love?
cups.soulLesson: You are worthy of love. Open to receive what universe offers.
cups.careerInterpretation: New work you love. Emotional fulfillment in career. Follow heart.
cups.romanceInterpretation: New love or deepening relationship. Heart opens fully.
cups.wellnessInterpretation: Emotional healing begins. Heart's wounds mend. Love heals all.
cups.familyInterpretation: Family love flows. Emotional renewal. Heart reconnects.
cups.selfGrowthInterpretation: Open your heart. Love yourself fully. Emotional awakening begins.
cups.schoolInterpretation: Fall in love with learning. Emotional connection to subject.

psychology.coreMetaphor: First feeling in therapy after numbness: painful but healing begins.
psychology.growthPrompt: What new feeling is emerging? Can you let your heart open?

swords.name: Ace of Swords
swords.uprightMeaning: Breakthrough clarity. Truth cuts through illusion. Mental clarity.
swords.shadowWork: What truth are you avoiding? What clarity do you fear?
swords.soulLesson: Truth liberates. Your mind is powerful. Clarity is birthright.
swords.careerInterpretation: Mental clarity about career. Truth revealed. Clear decision possible.
swords.romanceInterpretation: Truth in relationship. Honest communication. Clarity about feelings.
swords.wellnessInterpretation: Mental clarity affects physical health. Understand mind-body connection.
swords.familyInterpretation: Truth spoken in family. Clarity cuts through dysfunction.
swords.selfGrowthInterpretation: Mental breakthrough. See clearly now. Truth sets free.
swords.schoolInterpretation: Sudden understanding. Concept clicks. Mental clarity in learning.

psychology.coreMetaphor: Breakthrough in therapy: sudden clarity about pattern. Truth emerges.
psychology.growthPrompt: What truth is trying to emerge? Can you face it clearly?

pentacles.name: Ace of Pentacles
pentacles.uprightMeaning: Material opportunity. New job or income. Prosperity seed. Ground your dreams.
pentacles.reversedMeaning: Missed opportunity. Poor planning. Materialism without meaning.
pentacles.shadowWork: Can you receive abundance? Do you feel worthy of prosperity?
pentacles.soulLesson: Universe provides. You are worthy of material abundance.
pentacles.careerInterpretation: Job offer or raise. Business opportunity. Ground-floor potential.
pentacles.romanceInterpretation: Relationship stability. Potential for lasting commitment. Grounded love.
pentacles.wellnessInterpretation: New health opportunity. Body ready for change. Physical improvement.
pentacles.familyInterpretation: Family financial improvement or new home. Material stability.
pentacles.selfGrowthInterpretation: Ground spiritual insights in material reality. Abundance available.
pentacles.schoolInterpretation: Scholarship, grant, or educational opportunity. Invest in learning.

psychology.coreMetaphor: New skills in therapy: practice grounds insight into real change.
psychology.growthPrompt: What opportunity is presenting? How can you ground dreams in reality?

_meta.note: This is a SAMPLE with key cards. Full deck has all 78 cards.
